explains: adj. 任性的；不规则的；刚愎的

sentences.en: If you come across a wayward chunk of moon, don't try to cash in on it.
sentences.cn: 如果你遇到一大块形状不规则的月球岩石，不要企图拿它卖钱。

sentences.en: These passions, like great winds, have blown me hither and thither, in a wayward course, over a deep ocean of anguish, reaching to the very verge of despair.
sentences.cn: 这些激情像飓风，无处不在、反复无常地吹拂着我，吹过深重的苦海，濒于绝境。
亚原子粒子可能是任性的。
